lines.gurmukhi: nYhr kuAwir kMinAw lwiflI kY mwnIAiq ibAwhy ssurwr jwie gunnu kY mwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Naihar Kuaari Kanniaa Laadilee Kai Maaneeati , Biaahay Sasuraar Jaai Gounanu Kai Maaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: An unmarried daughter is loved by everyone in parental house and enjoys respect in the in-laws house because of her virtues.

lines.gurmukhi: bnj ibauhwr lig jwq hY ibdyis pRwnI khIey spUq lwB lBq kY AwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Banaj Biuhaar Lagi Jaat Hai Bidaysi Praanee , Kaheeay Sapoot Laabh Labhat Kai Aaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As one goes to other cities to trade and earn living, but one is known as an obedient son only when one makes profit;

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau sMgRwm smY pr dl mY Akylo jwie jIiq AwvY soeI sUro suBtu bKwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Sangraam Samai Par Dal Mai Akaylo Jaai , Jeeti Aavai Soee Sooro Soubhatu Bakhaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As a warrior ingresses into enemy ranks and comes out victorious is known as a brave man.

lines.gurmukhi: mwns jnmu pwie crin srin gur swDsMgiq imlY gurduAwir pihcwnIAY ]118]
lines.transliteration_english: Maanas Janamu Paai Charani Sarani Gur , Saadhasangati Milai Gurduaari Pahichaaneeai ?118?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly he who enjoins the holy gatherings, acquire the refuge of the True Guru is accepted in the court of the Lord. (118)
